paragraph: Mariya Nishiuchi (西内 まりや, Nishiuchi Mariya, born December 24, 1993 in Fukuoka Prefecture) is a Japanese model, actress, and singer-songwriter who is affiliated with Rising Production. She is the younger sister of model, actress, and BeForU member Hiromi Nishiuchi.
Nicola, Shinchosha 1997-, as an exclusive model from 2007 to 2010
Seventeen, Shueisha 1967-, as an exclusive model from 2010 to 2015
Official profile at Rising Production (in Japanese)
Official profile at Seventeen On Line (in Japanese)
